metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14040 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Bootstrap before 4.1.2, XSS is possible in the collapse data-parent attribute.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14040` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fonts-glyphicons-halflings - 3.4.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

libjs-bootstrap - 3.4.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: twitter-bootstrap3 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.0+dfsg-1').
